tool.name: SAGA.imagery_opencv.11
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayFEATURES True isArrayMODEL_LOAD False isArrayTRAIN_AREAS False isArrayTRAIN_CLASS False isArrayMODEL_SAVE False output_data_CLASSES $output_data_CLASSES name SAGA.imagery_opencv.11 FEATURES $FEATURES NORMALIZE $NORMALIZE RGB_COLORS $RGB_COLORS MODEL_LOAD $MODEL_LOAD TRAIN_AREAS $TRAIN_AREAS TRAIN_CLASS $TRAIN_CLASS TRAIN_BUFFER $TRAIN_BUFFER MODEL_SAVE $MODEL_SAVE ANN_LAYERS $ANN_LAYERS ANN_NEURONS $ANN_NEURONS ANN_MAXITER $ANN_MAXITER ANN_EPSILON $ANN_EPSILON ANN_ACTIVATION $ANN_ACTIVATION ANN_ACT_ALPHA $ANN_ACT_ALPHA ANN_ACT_BETA $ANN_ACT_BETA ANN_PROPAGATION $ANN_PROPAGATION ANN_RP_DW0 $ANN_RP_DW0 ANN_RP_DW_PLUS $ANN_RP_DW_PLUS ANN_RP_DW_MINUS $ANN_RP_DW_MINUS ANN_RP_DW_MIN $ANN_RP_DW_MIN ANN_RP_DW_MAX $ANN_RP_DW_MAX ANN_BP_DW $ANN_BP_DW ANN_BP_MOMENT $ANN_BP_MOMENT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.outputType_CLASSES transmissionMode_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.transmissionMode_CLASSES

param.name: FEATURES
param.label: Features
param.help: Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: RGB_COLORS
param.label: Update Colors from Features
param.help: Use the first three features in list to obtain blue, green, red components for class colour in look-up table.

param.name: MODEL_LOAD
param.label: Load Model
param.help: Use a model previously stored to file. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: TRAIN_AREAS
param.label: Training Areas
param.help: Training Areas The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json

param.name: TRAIN_CLASS
param.label: Class Identifier
param.help: Class Identifier The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TRAIN_BUFFER
param.label: Buffer Size
param.help: For non-polygon type training areas, creates a buffer with a diameter of specified size.

param.name: MODEL_SAVE
param.label: Save Model
param.help: Stores model to file to be used for subsequent classifications instead of training areas. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: ANN_LAYERS
param.label: Number of Layers
param.help: You can specify the number of layers in the network (not including input and output layer).

param.name: ANN_NEURONS
param.label: Number of Neurons
param.help: You can specify the number of neurons in each layer of the network.

param.name: ANN_EPSILON
param.label: Error Change (Epsilon)
param.help: Termination criteria of the training algorithm. You can specify how much the error could change between the iterations to make the algorithm continue (epsilon).

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CLASSES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CLASSES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Integration of the OpenCV Machine Learning library for Artificial Neural Network classification of gridded features.
